column1: Q34: Please indicate how challenging you expect the following aspects of data curation to be in the next 3 to 5 years on a scale of 1 to 5 where 1=Not challenging and 5=Very challenging.

column2: Count of Training and retooling library staff to support data curation services
column3: Count of Recruiting and retaining data curation staff
column5: Count of Changing journal/funder/domain requirements for data sharing
column6: Count of Expertise in curating certain domain data
column7: Count of Keeping up with technology changes
column8: Count of Scaling curation services with increased demand
